definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: An alliance with likeminded Red Talons may not be long in coming.
sentences.chinese: 有差不多意圖的聯盟部族比如紅爪不久也會這麼想。

sentences.english: The Chickasaw too had matrilineal clans.
sentences.chinese: 契卡索人也是母系的部族。

sentences.english: One of them was a member of the Navajo Nation.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一個是那維何部族的一員。

sentences.english: Also, each group had a totem animal which it was forbidden to kill.
sentences.chinese: 同時，各部族均有圖騰動物禁屠。

sentences.english: Chicheng ancient tribal Jinyun for the Yellow Emperor's way.
sentences.chinese: 赤城古爲黃帝部族縉雲氏地。

sentences.english: Tribes of hunter-gatherers have much more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在狩獵社會，部族裏個人的自由更多。

sentences.english: As a clan of being skilled in sericulture, Can Cong clan was named after silkworm.
sentences.chinese: 蠶叢氏作爲擅長養蠶制絲的部族，即以蠶而得名。

sentences.english: The lure of the blood trade drew Durge away from his tribe and into the rest of the galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 血腥交易的誘惑把德奇拖離部族，帶向銀河別處。

sentences.english: There were a lot of alien tribes on the borders of Song and Xixia.
sentences.chinese: 宋夏西北邊緣分佈着大量的蕃部族帳。

sentences.english: The thought of military law during Pre-Qin periods was showed military criminal law originated from clan war.
sentences.chinese: 先秦軍事法，最早表現爲部族戰爭中產生的軍事刑法。

sentences.english: Wendigo has taught his tribe the power that lies in harnessing the ice storm, its strength and implacability.
sentences.chinese: 教給他的部族冰暴中蘊涵的力量，那種力度和無情。

sentences.english: Henceforth the Cuan clan ruled Yunnan for over four hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 從此以後，爨部族在雲南統治了四百年。

sentences.english: Instead, the “tribe” is valued far more than any universal ideology.
sentences.chinese: 相反，“部族”比其他任何普適觀念都更有價值。

sentences.english: Papuan tribes used to have a legend.
sentences.chinese: 巴布亞部族曾有個傳說。

sentences.english: Houyi was the chief of the western tribe of Xia dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 后羿是生活於夏王朝西方的原始部族首領。

sentences.english: The Striders are a tribe of many contradictions.
sentences.chinese: 漫遊者是一個充滿矛盾的部族。

definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
headman (of primitive people)/tribal chief/used as translation for foreign leaders, e.g. Indian Rajah or Arab Sheik or Emir
